subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Renardo Sidney might not be a household name yet, but he is well on his way to becoming one. Some think he could be the next high school player with a Lebron-type impact at the N.B.A. level.
snippet: Renardo Sidney might not be a household name yet, but he is well on his way to becoming one. Some think he could be the next high school player with a Lebron-type impact at the N.B.A. level.
